title: LexMap Policy Schema
description: Schema for LexMap policy files that define module boundaries, permissions, and spatial coordinates

$schema.description: Reference to the JSON schema for validation

modules.description: Map of module IDs to their definitions

coords.description: 2D logical coordinates for spatial/topological reasoning about module relationships. Adjacent modules should have nearby coordinates.

owns_paths.description: File path patterns that this module owns

allowed_callers.description: Module IDs that are allowed to call this module

forbidden_callers.description: Module IDs that are explicitly forbidden from calling this module

feature_flags.description: Feature flags associated with this module

requires_permissions.description: Permissions required to access this module

kill_patterns.description: Patterns to avoid/eliminate in this module

description.description: Human-readable description of the module's purpose

metadata.description: Additional metadata about the policy file
